definition: A body part located on the hand, specifically one of the five digits, which is opposable to the other fingers and is typically used for grasping and manipulating objects. It is commonly employed in activities such as writing, holding utensils, and giving a thumbs-up gesture.

examples.german: Der Daumen ist der dickste Finger der Hand.
examples.english: The thumb is the thickest finger of the hand.

examples.german: Er hat sich den Daumen verletzt.
Sie drückte den Daumen für ihren Freund.
examples.english: She crossed her fingers for her friend.

examples.german: Der Daumen wird oft zum Hochhalten benutzt.
examples.english: The thumb is often used for thumbs up.

examples.german: Er hat einen grünen Daumen und kann gut Pflanzen pflegen.
examples.english: He has a green thumb and can take care of plants well.
